data.message: I don't support this. Why don't you show PRIDE FOR GOD.

replies.message:
God is a "religion" being gay is not!
And plus, god loves all people right? So they are, in a very round about way, supporting god... Lol

because your god is a clinging attempt for self comfort in adulthood stemming from a need to feel cared for and loved as in the child mother relationship as a child. Im proud i was able to see that in myself at 15 and stray away from the church and find real love inside my self.
Because god is fake? :P
2013 and believing in god...lets think about this.
I'm christian and I remember when it was a "sin" for a black person to kiss a white person. Once again people are using religion as an excuse to not allow everyone to be equal.
because fucktards like you are the reason were 1000 years behind the times...Dark ages?..that was a fun time
God is against this; He says so in the Bible, for all of you who think you can follow God AND be gay, you are wrong.

Jared, mixed marriages is not against the Bible, and being against mixed marriages is NEVER supported or has been supported Biblically...gay marriage is listed as a sin in both the Old and New Testaments.
Some of us don't believe in GOD.  Geesss..........

falling in love doesn't make you unholy... all prophecy is a matter of interpretation.. I highly doubt God would have a problem with two people falling in love and sharing that love with everyone the come into contact with... so much faith in the writings and approval of one editor..  shallow are those who believe that this vast universe is limited to just one book!!!
"God" is a lie, your Holy Bible is a lie, being gay is fine, being a religious person who shoves down their beliefs down someones throat, now that is a sin.
Exactly what Dwayne said above...

Seriously? What happened to "Love your neighbor as yourself?" I'm a Christian and I fully believe in God, and because of that I realize that I need to love EVERYONE. It isn't our place to judge the state of other people's souls, and it isn't our place to condemn others. Maybe you should focus on re-reading the Bible in order to relearn all of the things that you *obviously* missed the first time around?
everybody shows their own pride
Love is not the sin, gay sex is.
Soooo much hypocrisy in these comments....from the anti-religious folks. Tolerance goes both ways, remember that. Or you can just STFU.

If you could leave your homophobia at the door step..it would be ok..It sounds like a case of ignorance at play again..We are all God's children...if you do not believe..I hate it when people want to throw God into a conversation... He knows all, even when your husband is  downlow...Put your dentures back in...
Yeah another verse in the bible pretty much saying god loves all his children so doesn't that mean that he will still love gay people?

God loves all, but it is a sin to be a homosexual. If you listen to Phelps... I'm sorry but you arent very smart. I love all people, even gays. But I don't support them. No need for the name calling either. It's rude and immature..
god is gay!!!
and Stephen... that is probably one of the most pathetic excuse to leave the Church and God.
go kill yourself
ok look where they marched...in CA thats like a different country anyway so let them have their day over there...better there than in the rest of the country where people have sense
So we should allow you to be sick and not help you with your sickness
